content: {"name": "Hampden United Methodist Church, Hampden Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "FOOD PANTRY: Offers non-perishable food items. The pantry is open 9AM-11AM on the first 4 Wednesdays of the month, to anyone residing in Baltimore City, if there is a 5th Wednesday within a month the pantry is closed. Clients can access the pantry once a month. Formula, baby food and toiletries are rarely available. Call with special requests (baby formula, special dietary needs) before going to the pantry.", "email": "", "url": "https://hampdenchurch.org/hampden-food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3449 Falls Road, Hampden United Methodist Church", "address_2": null, "city": "Baltimore", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21211", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.327, "longitude": -76.6383}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 366-9138", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Baby formula may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Handicapped Access"}]}
